typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		hash_bus_key as string,
		work_category as string,
		effective_date as timestamp,
		work_category_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(effective_date = addMonths(effective_date,12)) ~> DerivedColumn1
